[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-map-controls](./harp-map-controls.md) &gt; [CameraPanAnimation](./harp-map-controls.camerapananimation.md)

## CameraPanAnimation class

Class to pan between the specified geo coordinates. Height can be specified to move the camera in and out.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class CameraPanAnimation extends CameraAnimation 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(mapView, options, name)](./harp-map-controls.camerapananimation._constructor_.md) |  | Creates a new <code>CameraPanAnimation</code> object. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [interpolation](./harp-map-controls.camerapananimation.interpolation.md) |  | (v: number\[\], k: number) =&gt; number | Specifies interpolation. Defaults to \[\[InterpolationFunction.CatmullRom\]\] |
|  [isRunning](./harp-map-controls.camerapananimation.isrunning.md) |  | boolean | Returns <code>true</code> if the animation is being played. |
|  [name](./harp-map-controls.camerapananimation.name.md) |  | string \| undefined |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addPosition(geoPos)](./harp-map-controls.camerapananimation.addposition.md) |  | Add a geo coordinate that should be visited. |
|  [start(time, onFinished)](./harp-map-controls.camerapananimation.start.md) |  | Start the animation. |
|  [stop()](./harp-map-controls.camerapananimation.stop.md) |  | Stop the animation. Can be started again (with original values only, though). |
